node.name: JavaScript
node.rich_text:
Introduction ======== 1. why javascript created ============== ->html , css only style purpose no intraction so that reason create javascript , first name live script after change js. ->without js any website doesn't create . eventhough facebook, google
2. javascript supports? â‡’ websites, webapp ,mobile apps, games, AI & machine learning also.
3. why js learn? -> any front end compalsory js need;
4.how javascript work? -> browser la mattum tha javascript execute engine available. -> laterly browser la irrunthu eduthu node la set pananga c++ la after that js demand anathu.
5. browser console js work why? -> by default js browser la only working. -> console.log means , web la console la show
